price: ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߦߴߊߟߎ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߞߘߐߓߐߟߌ ߡߊߜߙߏ߬ ߓߊ ߊߟߎ߫ ߞߙߐߕߐߣߍ߲߫ ߕߘߍ߬ ߣߌ߲߬ ߠߋ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: ذُوقُواْ فِتۡنَتَكُمۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: dhūqū fit'natakum hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi tastaʿjilūna
